column4: Is there any chance you guys could stop taking out the good posts of your OS? First you dropped Pidgin for Empathy which to be perfectly honest is lame. Now your shopping the alternate install disc so I can't set up with RAID or full disc encryption. What's going on?
I use pidgin. I'm using it now
its even in the next release
it is, you have the option to remove it
its not a mandatory package, it can be removed. You have that option
its not, i'm telling you how your OS works
I hate firefox, but I remove it and promptly install the browser I prefer
anything else you want to rant about?
then install Unity as you wish, if the alternate ISO is SOOOO important to you
do I know you from another channel?
no idea what that even is, sorry
